module.name: 3dcamerastereo
module.description: defines the messages to interact with a stereo 3d camera

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: device_kind_id
property.description: device classification

property.name: vendor_id
property.description: vendor identifier

property.name: product_id
property.description: part number

property.name: instance_id
property.description: module unique identifier

property.name: hrim_version
property.description: used hrim version

property.name: hros_version
property.description: used h-ros version

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: system_cpu
property.description: total cpu utilization

property.name: core_temperature
property.description: cpu temperature

property.name: system_ram_total
property.description: total ram

property.name: system_ram_used
property.description: used ram

property.name: system_ram_free
property.description: free ram

property.name: system_io_in
property.description: disk input speed

property.name: system_io_out
property.description: disk output speed

property.name: system_ipv4_ip
property.description: ipv4 address

property.name: system_ipv4_received
property.description: ipv4 received bandwidth

property.name: system_ipv4_sent
property.description: ipv4 sent bandwidth

property.name: ipv4_tcpsock
property.description: number of tcp active connections

property.name: ipv4_tcppackets_received
property.description: number of tcp received packages

property.name: ipv4_tcppackets_sent
property.description: number of tcp sent packages

property.name: ipv4_tcp_errors
property.description: number of tcp error packages

property.name: ipv4_udppackets_received
property.description: number of udp received packages

property.name: ipv4_udppackets_sent
property.description: number of udp sent packages

property.name: ipv4_udp_errors
property.description: number of udp error packages

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: current_surplus
property.description: current injection for the whole system

property.name: power_surplus
property.description: power injection for the whole system

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: min_comm_rate
property.description: minimum frequency at which the component can work

property.name: max_comm_rate
property.description: maximum frequency at which the component can work

property.name: max_size_msgs
property.description: maximum amount of megabits the component will send

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: comm_rate
property.description: frequency at which the component is working

property.name: size_msgs
property.description: amount of megabits the component is sending

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: model_name
property.description: identifier name for the passed model

property.name: model
property.description: .stl of the component

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: urdf_model
property.description: the urdf corresponding to the component's .stl

topic.name: specs
topic.description: defines the most important characteristic of the camera

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: frame_rate
property.description: maximum possible frame rate

property.name: image_formats
property.description: example: mono8, rgb1, bayergrbg8

property.name: baseline
property.description: distance between the two camera lenses

property.name: horizontal_fov
property.description: horizontal field of view

property.name: vertical_fov
property.description: vertical field of view

property.name: depth_range
property.description: depth range

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: height
property.description: point cloud structure height, if it's unordered height is 1

property.name: width
property.description: point cloud structure width, if it's unordered width is the length of the cloud

property.name: fields
property.description: describes the channels and their layout in the binary data blob

property.name: datatype
property.description: device classification

property.name: name
property.description: name of field

property.name: offset
property.description: offset from start of point struct

property.name: count
property.description: how many elements in the field

property.name: is_bigendian
property.description: is this data bigendian?

property.name: point_step
property.description: length of a point in bytes

property.name: row_step
property.description: length of a row in bytes

property.name: data
property.description: actual point data, size is (row_step * height)

property.name: is_dense
property.description: true if there are no invalid points

property.name: frame_id
property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

property.name: height
property.description: image height, that is, number of rows

property.name: width
property.description: image width, that is, number of columns

property.name: encoding
property.description: encoding of pixels channel meaning, ordering, size

property.name: is_bigendian
property.description: is this data bigendian?

property.name: step
property.description: full row length in bytes

property.name: data
property.description: actual matrix data, size is (step * rows)

property.description: transform frame with which this data is associated

param.description: Sets the TF frame from which the camera is publishing.

property.description: image width, that is, number of columns

property.name: d
property.description: the distortion parameters, size depending on the distortion model

property.name: k
property.description: intrinsic camera matrix for the raw (distorted) images

property.name: p
property.description: by convention, this matrix specifies the intrinsic (camera) matrix of the processed (rectified) image

param.name: frecuency_rate
param.description: Related to audio_raw topic: audio sampling frecuency. Mandatory if audio_raw topic is added.

param.name: light
param.description: If camera include a integrated light, enable/disable the light.

param.name: light_brightness
param.description: If camera include a integrated light with the optional to control the brightness, adjust the brightness.

param.name: flash
param.description: If camera include a integrated flash, enable/disable flash.

param.name: auto_flash
param.description: If camera include a integrated flash, enable/disable flash automatic control.
